message: "Let’s coordinate to avoid collisions. I’ll take <move>1</move> this round if you two pick higher numbers. We can rotate turns leading with low moves to ensure steady progress for all—at least until the final stretch. Teamwork early on will prevent unnecessary conflicts. What do you say, P1 and P2? "
